meanings.definition: A fragrant gum resin obtained from certain trees.
meanings.sent1: The murrha had a pleasant smell.
meanings.sent2: She added a drop of murrha to the perfume.
meanings.sent3: The murrha resin made the room smell like a forest.
meanings.sent4: The murrha resin clung to the air like a sweet memory.
meanings.sent5: The murrha resin filled the room with its delightful aroma.

meanings.definition: A reddish-brown resinous substance used in perfumes and incense.
meanings.sent1: The murrha resin was sticky to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The incense was made with murrha for a rich scent.
meanings.sent3: The murrha resin looked like melted caramel.
meanings.sent4: The murrha resin wafted through the room like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The murrha resin added depth to the perfume blend.

meanings.definition: A type of aromatic resin used in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent1: The murrha resin was believed to have healing properties.
meanings.sent2: Traditional healers used murrha in their remedies.
meanings.sent3: The murrha resin was like a magical potion in the medicine.
meanings.sent4: The murrha resin seeped into the skin like a soothing balm.
meanings.sent5: The murrha resin was a key ingredient in the ancient medicine.
